title: Fairy Picture with Bird  (Recto);  Untitled  (Verso)
provenance_text:
Carl-Henning Pedersen [1913-2007], Copenhagen, Denmark; Erik Andreasen, Copenhagen, Denmark [1]; James L. Winokur [1922-2009], Pittsburgh, PA, 1956 [2]; partial gifts to Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute (subsequently Carnegie Museum of Art,) Pittsburgh, PA, 1977 to 1988 [3].

Notes:
[1]. Dr. Andreasen's location is also given in some sources as Lyngby, Denmark.
[2]. Purchased from Erik Andreasen in 1956 for $800.  See copy of memorandum from Reed Smith Shaw & McClay, dated December 11, 1985 (copy in curatorial file for 77.89.26.)
[3]. The painting was accessioned as a 1977 year-end partial gift on February 9, 1978. Committee action on completion of the gift as a 1988 year-end gift was taken on February 2, 1989.
